text: GameStop is an American company that sells things like video games. The company is based in Grapevine, Texas, United States. Grapevine is a suburb of Fort Worth. Plus, it has over 5,509+ retail stores throughout the United States, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, and Europe, all around the world. This is as of February 1, 2020. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1980s establishments in Texas Category:1984 establishments in the United States Category:Video game companies of the United States Category:Companies based in Texas Category:Retail markets
title: GameStop
